description: The tnDot1agCfmMepLbmTestComplete notification indicates that
a loopback test has been issued and results are ready.
The Target MAC Address Field to be transmitted: A unicast
destination MAC address.
This address will be used if the value of the column
dot1agCfmMepTransmitLbmDestIsMepId is 'false'.
variables.name: IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::dot1agCfmMepTransmitLbmDestMacAddress

description: The tnDot1agCfmMepLtmTestComplete notification indicates that
a linktrace test has been issued and results are ready. The
dot1agCfmMepTransmitLtmSeqNumber indicates the Transaction
Identifier to use to retrieve the Link-trace results.
The LTM Transaction Identifier
(dot1agCfmMepLtmNextSeqNumber) of the LTM sent.
The value returned is undefined if
dot1agCfmMepTransmitLtmResult is false.
variables.name: IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::dot1agCfmMepTransmitLtmSeqNumber

description: The tnDot1agCfmMepDMTestComplete notification indicates that a
One-Way-Delay-Test (OWDT) frame, or a Two-Way-Delay-Test (TWDT) response
was received. For an OWDT frame, traps are raised only when a delay
threshold of three (3) seconds is exceeded.
The value of tnDot1agCfmMepDelayTestDelay indicates the amount
of time, measured in microseconds, from when the test-frame was
transmitted to the time it was received minus the local processing time
taken by the remote system.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepDelayTestDelay

description: The tnDot1agCfmMepAisStateChanged notification is generated when
a MEP enters or exits an AIS state.
The value of tnDot1agCfmMepEthRxAis indicates the MEP is receiving
AIS test frames from one or more of its sub-layer MEPs.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepEthRxAis

description: The tnDot1agCfmMepSLMTestComplete notification is generated when
a two-way Synthetic Loss Measurement (SLM) test is completed.

event.Summary: Synthetic loss measurement test completed successfully

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSLMTestComplete TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmTestId u 9999 TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmRemoteMepId u 1 TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmLastTxSeqF u 9999 TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketIn c 9999 TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossIn i 9999 TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossOut i 9999 TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketUnack u 9999

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepSlmTestId indicates the test identifier
that was used to initiate the Synthetic Loss Measurement (SLM) test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmTestId

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepSlmRemoteMepId indicates the MEP
Identifier of the remote node involved in the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmRemoteMepId

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepSlmLastTxSeqF indicates the last
received sequence number on the local node, transmitted by the
remote node.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmLastTxSeqF

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketIn indicates the number of
packets received during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketIn

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossIn indicates the number of
packets transmitted from the remote node but not received on the local
node during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossIn

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossOut indicates the number of
packets transmitted from the local node but not received on the remote
node during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketLossOut

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketUnack indicates the number of
unacknowledged lost packets during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepSlmPacketUnack

description: The tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTestComplete notification is generated when
a on-demand regular Loss Measurement (LM) test is completed.
The value of tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTnTF indicates the total number of
near-end transmitted service frames from the remote node during the
execution of the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTnTF

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTnLF indicates the total number of
near-end lost service frames on the local node during the execution of
the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTnLF

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTfTF indicates the total number of
far-end transmitted service frames from the local node during the
execution of the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTfTF

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTfLF indicates the total number of
far-end lost service frames on the remote node during the execution of
the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmTfLF

description: The value of tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmUnack indicates the number of
unacknowledged lost LM packets during the execution of the test.
variables.name: TN-IEEE8021-CFM-MIB::tnDot1agCfmMepOndemandLmUnack
